programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: An Evening with Dua Lipa
programme.desc: Dua Lipa performs for the first time at the Royal Albert Hall in London in this show.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Super-Agers: Wisdom at 90+ - Tonight
programme.desc: Britain today has a record number of people aged 90 and over - this film meets five remarkable men and women proving that life in our nineties can be anything but quiet.

programme.title: The Jonathan Ross Show: Special Guests
programme.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Cristiano Ronaldo, the Spice Girls, Lee Evans, Ed Sheeran, Emily Blunt, Rio Ferdinand and Sheridan Smith.

programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern as Kelly gets her chance to open the iconic red boxes and tries to hold her nerve until just the right moment to beat the Banker.

programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz gossip.

programme.title: Sara Davies Christmas Craft Off
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt and Lisa Riley join Sara for festive fun with pom-poms, a tree topper, decoupage and gingerbread mayhem as they aim to shine as a Christmas star.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Three sets of friends battle it out in this edition - Marta and Shane from Dursley, Ann and Joyce from West Yorkshire, and David and Sumbul from St Albans and Durham.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Luke goes up against the Banker and tries to be the one to take home the jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Tim from Southampton, Jacqui from Northwich, Caroline from Falkirk and Dale from Burton-on-Trent - come together to take on a Chaser.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.desc: Rona Dougall is joined by celebrity guests to reflect on some of the events and personalities that have shaped 2025.

programme.desc: Moira is furious, Ray is alarmed, and Vanessa questions Charity.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Trying to Lingo all the way are cousins Danny and Alison from London and Cambridge, Andy with his son Dave from Dundee, and married couple Sue and Jane from Hebden Bridge.

programme.desc: Its Davids turn to take on the Banker as Stephen Mulhern hosts the iconic game show with only one question.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Neil from Stockport, Sally from York, Keletso from Nottingham, Jonny from Walton-on-Thames and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Will celebrates his 16th birthday in a hotel room with Megan, Sally clashes with Joanie over a schedule conflict, and Dee-Dee is saddened when James fails to turn up to her meal.
